creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: railyard with five standing men at right; train cars in LLQ and one car and engine behind men; power lines above; two tunnels with bridge over them left of center in middle ground; train engine on top of bluff in ULQ; tall building left of center in distance beyond bridge
inscription:
Signature, Title, Edition and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [27739] and [240027]
signed: URC, in the print: [Ch. Heyman]; LRC below image, in pencil: [Ch. Heyman]; LLC at bottom edge, in pencil: [Les Chemis de fer, La Station de la Plaine]; LRC below image, in pencil: [1/30 - Station de la Plaine]
title: Les chemis de fer, Station de la Plaine
